snippet: A woman who livestreamed the fatal police shooting of her boyfriend during a traffic stop in Minnesota last year was charged Friday in a reported assault....

headline.main: Oklahoma's Westbrook Thinks Mixon Should Be at NFL Combine
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma's Westbrook Thinks Mixon Should Be at NFL Combine

lead_paragraph: A woman who livestreamed the fatal police shooting of her boyfriend during a traffic stop in Minnesota last year was charged Friday in a reported assault.
